Project Manager for enterprise customers who are implementing our Impact 360 Workforce Optimization suite.

Founded consultancy enterprise to design and manage implementation of community-based applications and software to business-development professionals, including business owners, developers, and sales teams. Leverage extensive expertise in Sage SalesLogix CRM platform to strengthen business practices and optimize service offerings. Serve as on-site Business Analyst, working with clients to determine system requirements and design opportunities for software solutions. Orchestrate implementation of designed systems, leading teams of internal and external Software Engineers throughout planning, testing, and deployment. Lead training initiatives to ensure client knowledge of system modifications. As SourceCentrix Principal in parallel, collaborate with Software Engineers and Architects on design and implementation of software product targeting real-estate development industry (www.HobnobOnline.com). Direct product-development initiatives, investigating software needs and seeing development pipelines from idea inception through testing and deployment.

Directed 12-member team of Project Managers, Business Analysts, and Software Engineers for Professional Services Group [PSG] in identifying and creating long-term strategies needed to increase customer base and drive revenue growth. Managed contract and rate development, business-development initiatives, time tracking, billing, and commission structures in order to meet corporate revenue objectives. Analyzed comprehensive history of projects, determining profit levels and identifying opportunities for improvement to internal project methodologies. Collaborated with sales, support, product-management, and development teams to ensure unilateral success of all project goals.•	Drove annual revenue from $500K to $2M within three years of engagement by optimizing customer-service offerings and quality in order to dramatically expand customer base and generate additional projects.•	Reduced monthly customer refunds from $10K to $0 by pioneering innovative project methodology that established product-development lifecycle roadmaps to ensure proper software design and client knowledge, eliminating costly mistakes and dramatically improving customer-satisfaction rates.•	Increased workload capacity by implementing attainable bonus plan, effectively increasing revenue through incentive structure that drove employee interest in additional projects and overtime capabilities.•	Expanded interdepartmental communications by instituting regular cross-functional meetings to promote product offerings, internal projects, and software capabilities.

Orchestrated CRM projects using SalesLogix platform, managing entire project lifecycle from requirements solicitation through post-implementation. Managed cross-functional teams in process design, engineering, and quality-assurance activities. Authored project plans, allocated necessary resources, created detailed documentation, and interfaced with customer to ensure project deliverables aligned with expectations. Coordinated on-time and on-budget delivery of 20+ annual projects.•	Recognized as Project Lead for Safety-Kleen branch-automation project, deploying advanced technologies to 160+ branches. Served in change-management role to restructure project and strengthen operations throughout entire pipeline.
Senior Software Engineer & Business Analyst, Professional Services

Recruited to work with customers on determining software needs and project requirements related to large-scale SalesLogix implementations. Analyzed current infrastructure, designing, developing, testing, and implementing customized changes to client systems. Authored design documents and gained Senior Management approval to ensure that project deployments aligned with customer objectives. Coordinated successful migration and integration of all data systems.•	Spearheaded design, development, and deployment of multicurrency enhancement and sales methodology to SalesLogix system for notable international software company.

His subject matter knowledge on the technology was outstanding and very detailed, as were his contacts throughout the industry surrounding the technology. I would not hesitate to hire him again for any similar projects, and give him my highest recommendation for anyone considering his services.

I had the pleasure of working with Mike while I was serving as Senior Vice President and General Manager for SalesLogix, a part of Sage Software.  Mike took over the leadership of the professional services group in the wake of a restructuring caused by a large number of professional services employees leaving to form a rival firm.  Mike demonstrated a lot of strengths during this time--leadership, ability to handle significant and ongoing pressure, excellent technical apptitude, strong values, and great teamwork.  We eventually turned the organization around and it was largely Mike's tireless devotion and limitless energy that made that turnaround possible.  I very much enjoyed working with Mike and would welcome the opportunity to partner with him again!

I hired Louis about three years ago and was his direct manager for the next three years.  He is bright, articulate and very good at troubleshooting.  He was able to get up to speed on the SalesLogix lan and mobile products very quickly.  Soon after that, we put him to work troubleshooting implementation and customization issues.  In each case, he methodically got to the root cause of the issue and identified the solution to correct the issue.  Louis was also a strong Business Analyst and Software Engineer.  He even managed his own projects.  His well-rounded skillset makes him an asset to any organization.  I enjoyed working with Louis and would recommend him to anyone looking for a solid Software Engineer or Business Analyst.

summary: Strategic and results-oriented Professional Services Manager with history of success leading high-profile projects across startup and corporate environments. Proven track record of championing new customer-focused systems that promote business development and optimal functionality of all internal systems.
